mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(AMT_IN_OUT),0) FROM CONSUME_INFO WHERE NO_PERSON = #{no_person , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TO_NUMBER(DT_TRD) >= TO_NUMBER(#{dt_from , jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND TO_NUMBER(DT_TRD) <= TO_NUMBER(#{dt_to , jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND TYPE_IN_OUT = #{type_in_out , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND YN_CANCEL = 'N'

SELECT CI.SEQ_CONSUME ,CI.TYPE_IN_OUT ,CI.MEANS_CONSUME ,CI.CD_FC ,CI.NM_CARD ,CI.NO_CARD ,CI.TYPE_CARD ,CI.DT_TRD ,CI.TM_TRD ,CI.NO_BIZ ,CI.NM_BIZ ,CI.CD_CLASS ,PCCI.NM_CLASS ,CI.CD_TYPE ,PCCI.NM_TYPE ,CI.CONTENTS ,CI.MEMO ,CI.GRADE ,CI.AMT_IN_OUT ,CI.NO_APPROVAL ,CI.MON_INSTALLMENT ,CI.MON_REMAINING ,CI.YN_PAY_INSTALLMENT FROM CONSUME_INFO CI, PERSON_CONSUME_CLASS_INFO PCCI WHERE CI.NO_PERSON = #{no_person , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CI.NO_PERSON = PCCI.NO_PERSON AND CI.CD_CLASS = PCCI.CD_CLASS AND CI.CD_TYPE = PCCI.CD_TYPE AND TO_NUMBER(DT_TRD) >= TO_NUMBER(#{dt_from , jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND TO_NUMBER(DT_TRD) <= TO_NUMBER(#{dt_to , jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND YN_CANCEL = 'N' AND YN_BUDGET_EXCEPT = 'N' ORDER BY CI.DT_TRD DESC, CI.TM_TRD DESC

SELECT DISTINCT CD_CLASS ,NM_CLASS ,CD_TYPE ,NM_TYPE FROM PERSON_CONSUME_CLASS_INFO WHERE NO_PERSON = #{no_person , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TO_NUMBER(CD_CLASS) < 10 AND CD_TYPE IS NOT NULL AND YN_USE = 'Y' ORDER BY CD_CLASS ASC, CD_TYPE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT CD_CLASS ,NM_CLASS ,CD_TYPE ,NM_TYPE FROM PERSON_CONSUME_CLASS_INFO WHERE NO_PERSON = #{no_person , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TO_NUMBER(CD_CLASS) > 10 AND CD_TYPE IS NOT NULL AND YN_USE = 'Y' ORDER BY CD_CLASS ASC, CD_TYPE ASC
